thread.section_title: lastminute.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of lastminute.com | www.lastminute.com
thread.title: Lev Yudalevich

author: Lev Yudalevich
title: Lev Yudalevich
text: Flight was cancelled. All my emails return with automated responses. Phone call promises to find an alternative flight during a week are not fulfilled and even denied. Nobody gets back, even after promising to escalate my issue and to find a solution in 24 hours. Terrible customer service and stolen money. Never ever even think to buy at Lastminute.com!
